Separation.definition: cessation of cohabitation between a married couple by mutual agreement with intent that it be permanent ;also

1.definition: cessation of cohabitation between a married couple by mutual agreement with intent that it be permanentcompare
1.note: In some cases in which the estrangement is extreme, a separation is considered to have occurred even when the couple retain the same residence if they have stopped communicating and engaging in sexual relations and intend to be separated.

2.definition: termination of a contractual relationship (as employment or military service)
